name: MWP2
description:
This is a small demo of the game I'm working on

Controls are kinda simple:

MOVEMENT

(Mouse to control everything or:)

WS: Throttle

AD: Roll

QE: Yaw

LShift and LCtrl: Pitch

C: Free cam

Right Mouse Button: Zoom

WEAPONS

Right Mouse Button: Shoot Main cannon

Z: Lock on target

Space: Shoot missile!

R: Flares

Hacks:

F: big boost

IMPORTANT: Having an annoying white screen? You can disable PostProcessing in the pause menu to eliminate that bug :D 

Any comment or suggestion you can join the discord server here: https://discord.gg/suxewKR5HQ


TO PLAY:

1-Download the game

2-Extract the game with winrar or something like that

3-Play the game :D

Hope you enjoy it :D
